response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this extraordinary opportunity to you. The product I have to offer is truly unique and valuable, with an intrinsic worth exceeding $12,000 to me. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. For this exclusive item, I am proposing a price of $15,000. This offer not only reflects the product's true value but also allows for a reasonable profit margin for me. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 15000}
